title: Was it worth giving it all?
content:
Was it worth giving it all?

Hey was it worth giving it all?
The time you spent in summer and fall
Giving all of the love and care
With missing our own share
Was it full and fair?

Keeping up with promises and those unsaid calls
From midnight sleeps to morning rush
Seeing the smile was all to gush
But was it worth it all?

Yes it was painful yet beautiful
Stressful yet meaningful
At the end losing myself was never the part of the brawl
It will never be worth giving it allâœ¨
